C1 Tourism.notes: Single entry, extendable for tourism, visiting friends/family, meetings

C2 Business.notes: Single entry, extendable for business activities, meetings, shopping

C7 Professional.notes: Professional events: chefs, yoga instructors, bartenders, photographers

C18 Work Trial.notes: NEW 2025: Skill assessment only, cannot convert to working permit

C22A Academy Internship.notes: Academic internship from overseas education institution

D1 Tourism/Meetings.notes: Multiple entry tourist visa for tourism, meetings, conventions

D12 Business Investigation.notes: Business investigation and market research purposes

Freelance KITAS (E23).notes: Freelancer long stay permit - requires client contracts or sponsorship

Working KITAS (E23).notes: Employment long stay permit - requires company sponsorship + work permit

Investor KITAS (E28A).notes: Investment long stay permit - requires PT PMA with min 10B IDR capital

Remote Worker KITAS (E33G).requirements: Proof of remote employment, USD 60,000/year income, health insurance
Remote Worker KITAS (E33G).notes: Digital nomad long stay permit - FASTEST VITAS approval (4 days!)

Spouse KITAS (E31A).notes: Spouse of Indonesian citizen or foreigner with KITAS/KITAP

Investor KITAP.requirements: 3 years continuous KITAS E28A, significant investment

Working KITAP.requirements: 3 years continuous KITAS E23, stable employment

Family KITAP.requirements: 3 years continuous KITAS E31, family relationship proof

Retirement KITAP.requirements: Age 55+, pension proof, 3 years KITAS E33F

PT PMA Company Setup.includes: Deed preparation, Minister approval, NIB, NPWP, domicile letter

NPWPD Company.notes: Company regional tax number (Bali provincial tax)

important_warnings.overstay: ‚ö†Ô∏è Overstaying even 1 day = 6-month ban minimum. 61+ days = deportation + 1-2 year ban.
important_warnings.bpjs_mandatory: ‚ö†Ô∏è BPJS health insurance is MANDATORY for KITAS 6+ months. Cannot extend without BPJS payment proof.
important_warnings.alcohol_license: ‚ö†Ô∏è Alcohol license takes 45-60 days MINIMUM and is a major bottleneck. Start this EARLY!
important_warnings.pt_pma_capital: ‚ö†Ô∏è PT PMA requires REAL capital (10B IDR minimum). Cannot use borrowed funds - notary verifies.
important_warnings.nominee_risk: ‚ö†Ô∏è Nominee structures are legally GREY AREA and HIGH RISK. Not recommended by Bali Zero.
important_warnings.work_permit: ‚ö†Ô∏è KITAS ‚â† work permit. E23 Working KITAS requires separate IMTA (work permit) from Manpower Ministry.
important_warnings.tax_residency: ‚ö†Ô∏è 183+ days/year in Indonesia = Tax resident = Must file Indonesian tax return on worldwide income.

cost_optimization_tips.offshore_vs_onshore: Apply OFFSHORE (from home country) to save 2-3 million IDR vs onshore application
cost_optimization_tips.bundled_services: Bundle multiple services (company + visa + tax) for 10-15% discount - ask for package quote
cost_optimization_tips.early_planning: Start visa process 60-90 days before needed date to avoid rush fees
cost_optimization_tips.tax_optimization: Small business rate (11% vs 22%) available if revenue <50B IDR/year - plan accordingly
cost_optimization_tips.bpjs_timing: Register BPJS at start of KITAS (not at extension) to avoid delays
